data.title: Henry Cavill Revealed as New James Bond in Full Trailer - Inside the Magic
data.meta_description: Audiences have been demanding Henry Cavill as James Bond for years, and they have finally gotten their wish.
data.text:
007 fans have finally gotten what they have been asking for: Henry Cavill as the world‚Äôs greatest spy, James Bond.

Daniel Craig Out, Henry Cavill In

The speculation as to who will be cast as James Bond for the character‚Äôs 26th film has been heating up since Daniel Craig hung up his Walther PPK after No Time to Die (2021), his final portrayal of the spy as a mentally burdened, dead-eyed government agent. For years, Craig had made it very clear that he felt constrained by fan expectations and the limitations of the character. At one point, he went so far as to say he would ‚Äúrather break this glass and slash [his] wrists‚Äù than return, which he eventually did. It‚Äôs up to Henry Cavill to see if he wants to take on the mantle.

Every time that MGM, which was acquired by Amazon Studios in a legally tricky takeover in 2022 that is currently being investigated by the antitrust arm of the Federal Trade Commission, gears up to select a new James Bond from tens of thousands of actors, it‚Äôs a pretty big deal. The question of who will play the next 007 is serious enough that there is an entire cottage industry of bookmakers placing high-stakes bets on actors; currently, Aaron Taylor-Johnson is the leading favorite, followed by Taron Egerton, Theo James, James Norton, Leo Woodall, and Jonathan Bailey.

Related: Henry Cavill Has Been Cast as New Wolverine in the MCU: Report

However, for years, there have been two fan-favorite contenders for the role, Idris Elba and Henry Cavill. While Elba was long considered a prime candidate, he has revealed that the racially tinged conversation around the subject ‚Äúmade the whole thing disgusting and off-putting.‚Äù That just leaves Henry Cavill to decide whether or not he‚Äôd finally like to take on the role of James Bond.

While Henry Cavill has not yet officially portrayed James Bond, he has come close over the years. In the past, he has played 007-adjacent roles like Napoleon Solo in The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015), a CIA operative in Mission: Impossible: Fallout (2018), the titular fictional spy in Argylle (2023), and real-life British commando Gus March-Phillipps in the upcoming The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare.

Now, a full trailer featuring Henry Cavill as James Bond and Margot Robbie as a mysterious new character has hit the Internet, and fans are going crazy.

‚ÄòJames Bond 26‚Äô

Several days ago, a new trailer for the 26th James Bond movie was uploaded to YouTube and has already racked up 2.6 million views. That‚Äôs not a surprise, considering it features the mega-wattage of Henry Cavill and Margot Robbie as Bond and an unnamed Bond girl.

It should be mentioned that this trailer for an unnamed Henry Cavill James Bond movie is an unauthorized fan-made video, which appears to take footage from movies like The Man from U.N.C.L.E. and Margot Robbie‚Äôs Focus (2015) to create a simulacrum of a 007 feature. Numerous shots in the trailer also seem to be AI-generated, but, all told, it‚Äôs a pretty astonishing look at what a movie like this could be.

The trailer features a disclaimer from KH Studio: ‚ÄúPlease note that this video is a concept trailer created solely for artistic and entertainment purposes. I have meticulously incorporated various effects, sound design, AI technologies, movie analytics, and other elements to bring my vision to life. Its purpose is purely artistic, aiming to entertain and engage with the YouTube community. My goal is to showcase my creativity and storytelling skills through this trailer. Thank you for your support, and let‚Äôs dive into the world of imagination! üçø‚Äù

Related: Disney Legend Dick Van Dyke Offered Role of James Bond, Actor Confirms

That said, it also includes a faux-press release for the movie, which sticks with the conceit that the movie will star Henry Cavill and be directed by Christopher Nolan, no less:

Hollywood heavyweights Henry Cavill and Margot Robbie are slated to take on the iconic roles in the highly anticipated Bond 26. This latest installment in the legendary franchise promises to deliver espionage thrills and heart-pounding action like never before.

Backed by MGM Studios and Universal, James Bond 26 boasts a star-studded cast and a top-tier filmmaking team. Under the direction of visionary filmmaker Christopher Nolan, known for his masterful work on ‚ÄúInception‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe Dark Knight‚Äù trilogy, audiences can expect a Bond film like no other. Cavill, renowned for his suave charm and undeniable charisma, steps into the role of the legendary MI6 agent with confidence and style. His portrayal of Bond is set to redefine the character for a new generation, blending classic sophistication with modern edge.

Joining Cavill on his mission is the incomparable Margot Robbie, who takes on the role of a formidable Bond girl. With her talent for bringing complex characters to life, Robbie‚Äôs portrayal promises to add depth and intrigue to the espionage thriller. Filming for Bond 26 is scheduled to commence in the summer of 2024 with locations spanning the globe from exotic locales to bustling cityscapes. As anticipation mounts for this electrifying installment, fans can expect a cinematic experience that will leave them shaken and stirred.

Henry Cavill recently spoke about the possibility of portraying the famed Ian Fleming character on The Rich Eisen Show, saying, ‚ÄúI have no idea. All I‚Äôve got to go off is the rumors. The same information you have. Maybe I‚Äôm too old now, maybe I‚Äôm not. It‚Äôs up to [producers] Barbara Broccoli and Mike Wilson, and we‚Äôll see what their plans are.‚Äù

It may not be a confirmation, but that‚Äôs not a no, either.
